resources.string:
Developer: Martyn Haigh
Version: 1.2
Inspired by: http://xkcd.com/743/
URL: http://github.com/martynhaigh/Tiny-Open-Source-Violin
To Seren: I still win :)

string-array.name: whatsNew
string-array.item: Scalable violin to suit the occasion - just click and drag the corners around the violin
Made the bow move forwards and back whilst you move your finger around
